    Author:
    Marc Conrad Vector class is used to indicate that the total varieties of items were not confirmed variables to indicate the count of the items are initialized to 0 at the beginning

      java.lang.String computeSum​()
      This method calculates the total value of each items and the total count of each items this method will be called in printReceipt method in DepositItemReceiver class the class name is derived by using getsimplename
      void machineclean​()
      This method will clear all the items in the recycling machine once it is cleared progress bar will be set to 0 once it is cleared totalweight and totalsize will be set to 0 Since the progress bar uses the total weight it should be set to total weight This method will be called in DepositItemReceiver class using an object of this class

        public void addItem​(DepositItem item)
        Parameters:
        item - This method will pass the DepositItems as a parameter and adds them one by one 1 is added to the myItems.indexOf(item) so that the count will start from 1

      • computeSum

        public java.lang.String computeSum​()
        This method calculates the total value of each items and the total count of each items this method will be called in printReceipt method in DepositItemReceiver class the class name is derived by using getsimplename

      • machineclean

        public void machineclean​()
        This method will clear all the items in the recycling machine once it is cleared progress bar will be set to 0 once it is cleared totalweight and totalsize will be set to 0 Since the progress bar uses the total weight it should be set to total weight This method will be called in DepositItemReceiver class using an object of this class
